title: Grey funnel line
creator_credit: Vincent Donovan, Brian Voce and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations
brief_description: Records a 1974 goodwill cruise by a RAN task force to exotic locations in Africa. Shows sailors exploring tropical Mauritius, and ancient ruins of Persepolis, and observing wildlife in Kenya’s Tsavo National Park.
creator_credit_for_label: Vincent Donovan, Brian Voce and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations
